src:
Federal appeals court in New York rejects Trump's bid to keep his tax returns from state criminal...
04 Nov 2019, 15:53 by EndPlay
NEW YORK - NEW YORK (AP) - Federal appeals court in New York rejects Trump's bid to keep his tax returns from state criminal investigators.
